name: Knox Blox Gelatin
author: Shirley Eftink
instructions: In large bowl, combine Knox unflavored gelatin and flavored gelatin; add boiling water and stir until gelatin dissolves. Pour into large, shallow baking pan (for example, 13 x 9 inches) and chill until firm. Cut into squares to serve. Makes about 100 one inch squares. They don't have to be refrigerated after they become firm. Ideal snack for children.
